summary: Passion: of people for the land and sea, of corporations for riches, and of men and women for each other. Vicente and Abigail run a banana plantation in Limon Province, on the Caribbean ... See full summary »
cast: Jorge Perugorría|Cuca Escribano|Maya Zapata|Roberto McLean|Vinicio Rojas|Thelma Darkings|Bismark Méndez|Leonardo Perucci|Arnoldo Ramos|Gabriel Retes|Xinia Rubie|Michelle Jones|Sara Astica|Melvin Méndez|Álvaro Marenco
title: Caribe
